title: virtual-cube.net
description: An online rubiks cube with webcam integration, self-solving, custom cube designs, and more!

title: AI Plays: Chess
description: Simulate a chess game between GPT-4o-mini, Gemini, Stockfish, Randombot, and yourself.

title: Codehoot
description: Remake of Kahoot!, for coders, used in University of Waterloo's CS136 Final Review Session.

title: Symptocare
description: An AI diagnosis for Boston University's Civil Tech hackathon using Machine Learning and OpenAI to give a diagnosis.

title: Lunar New Year Gala
description: As a member of the STEAM Team, I mentored the design of this website for the town library promoting its LNY festival.

title: Wordle
description: A command line Wordle Game featuring a bot that predicts the best word, versus mode, and a bot simulation mode.
